title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

of State at the Department of Enterprise, Trade and Employment) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department enterprise trade employment) order 2020

title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 2. Stephen Foley, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Stephen Foley, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Enterprise, Trade and Employment, is appointed as 
Special Adviser to Damien English, Minister of State at the Department of 
Enterprise, Trade and Employment with effect from 29 September 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [744] 3
